description: Authorities should monitor Grab's driver fare structure closely and observe whether commuters will be charged higher fees following the Grab-TransCab merger. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: After years of expansion, is Grab shifting gears to empire building?
title_page: After years of expansion, is Grab shifting gears to empire building? | The Straits Times
maintext:
“If we get this right, we can literally go into the history books,” a 32-year-old fresh-faced Anthony Tan told the Financial Times in 2014.
He was unabashedly ambitious. He had just launched what was GrabTaxi two years ago. He was on a self-declared mission to serve the daily needs of South-east Asians.
